EmailTemplate.description: When defect is created Email alert should go to the Owner
EmailTemplate.name: Defect Created
EmailTemplate.subject: Defect is created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The defect is created with Defect ID '{!Defect__c.Defect_ID__c}'
To view this Defect click on this link -
{!Detail_Link_URL.ZenBugTracker__Defect__c.Id}
Thanks & Regards Zensar System Administrator
